snippet: Charming Shoppes, owner of the Lane Bryant line of women's clothing, announced a deal on Wednesday to sell itself to the Ascena Retail Group for about $890 million.
abstract: Charming Shoppes, owner of the Lane Bryant line of women's clothing, announced a deal on Wednesday to sell itself to the Ascena Retail Group for about $890 million.

headline.main: Owner of Lane Bryant Is Sold
